title: Where’s Lachlan Going Now? Morton Sets Off on Epic 14,200km Ride to Break ‘Around Australia’ Record
content:
The EF Education-EasyPost 'alt rider' leaves September 5 on a quest to break the Around Australia record, which stands at 37 days, 20 hours, and 45 minutes.

Read the full article at Where’s Lachlan Going Now? Morton Sets Off on Epic 14,200km Ride to Break ‘Around Australia’ Record on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
